I cry at too many tv shows.

summary: hey soCould Carol bring back Vision? Cause her power comes from the Tesseract, and so did Vision’s. Right? Could she, like, make...
body:
hey so

Could Carol bring back Vision?

Cause her power comes from the Tesseract, and so did Vision’s. Right? Could she, like, make another mind stone, or something equivalent, and bring Vision back?

summary: I’ve read another chapter of No Road Home and kinda...
title: I’ve read another chapter of No Road Home and kinda...
body:
It was quite strange to see Wanda caring about no one else but Jericho. Okay, I can shut up about Vision but she could be worry about someone else? Maybe Pietro? WIccan? Speed? 

You got my idea, right?

@jimzub just why? XD

Also I suppose Marvel and co hate Vision for something I can’t catch. I love him anyway.

blog.name: scifibrasil

blog.description: eventos e notícias sobre o universo scifi e assuntos relacionados.

title: Estreia da semana
body:
Estreia hoje no Brasil: Shazam
 

Todos temos um heroi dentro da gente, basta deixar sair. E a palavra mágica é Shazam!
Anteriormente anunciamos que Suspíria seria lançado no dia 28/3 mas foi adiado novamente e tem estreia agendada, segundo o IMDB, para 11/4. Vamos aguardar!
Semana que vem, além de Suspíria, Hellboy chega aos cinemas com o Vermelhão sendo protagonizado por David Harbour (Stranger Things) e conta com Milla Jovovich no elenco!

Ainda neste mês teremos outros lançamentos de scifi e terror como A Maldição da Chorona, filme baseado numa lenda urbana mexicana e Replicas com Keanu Reeves, que devem estrear em 18/4.
Vingadores: Ultimato estreia por aqui em  25/4, certamente um dos filmes mais aguardados do ano, já que Guerra Infinita deixou muita gente de cabelo em pé. Será que conseguirão deter Thanos, finalmente?

Read the full article

blog.name: avengersstanforlife
blog.title: I'm with marvel till the end or the line.

summary: Like I will be sitting in a cinema 20 days from now watching this movie and it still doesnt feel like it's real. Also I will...
body:
So I just got my tickets for Avengers Endgame on the Wednesday 24th April and it has just dawned on me that this movie is literally not even a month away anymore.

Like I will be sitting in a cinema 20 days from now watching this movie and it still doesnt feel like it’s real. Also I will wait at least 1 week before posting spoilers and from now I will tag everything with spoilers.

blog.name: jennydyn
blog.title: JennyDyn
blog.description: Hi, I'm a mess, I like memes

summary: Flash: hEy PeNIs PaRkeR Nat: What the fuck did you just fucking say about Peter, you little bitch? I'll have you know I...
body:
Flash: hEy PeNIs PaRkeR

Nat: What the fuck did you just fucking say about Peter, you little bitch? I’ll have you know I graduated top of my class in the Red Room, and I’ve been involved in numerous secret raids around the world, and I have over 300 confirmed kills. I am trained in gorilla warfare and friends with the top sniper in the entire US armed forces. You are nothing to me but just another target. I will wipe you the fuck out with precision the likes of which has never been seen before on this Earth, mark my fucking words. You think you can get away with saying that shit to him? Think again, fucker. As we speak I am contacting my secret network of spies across the USA and your IP is being traced right now so you better prepare for the storm, maggot. The storm that wipes out the pathetic little thing you call your life. You’re fucking dead, kid. I can be anywhere, anytime, and I can kill you in over seven hundred ways, and that’s just with my bare hands. Not only am I extensively trained in unarmed combat, but I have access to the entire arsenal of S.H.I.E.L.D and I will use it to its full extent to wipe your miserable ass off the face of the continent, you little shit. If only you could have known what unholy retribution your little “clever” comment was about to bring down upon you, maybe you would have held your fucking tongue. But you couldn’t, you didn’t, and now you’re paying the price, you goddamn idiot. I will shit fury all over you and you will drown in it. You’re fucking dead, kiddo.

summary: Why does Avengers: Endgame take three hours long?
title: Why does Avengers: Endgame take three hours long?
body:
Why does Avengers: Endgame take three hours long?

When it was uncovered a week ago that Avengers: Endgame is authoritatively going to be the longest Marvel motion picture at a little more than three hours.

The news typically collected a rush of features. All of which basically come down to general astonishment at the length, with the consideration of jokes about settling in for some time, since goodness my god this will be a long motion…

View On WordPress
